meta.title: Valley Golf Clubhouse — New & Used Golf Clubs in Dayton, TN
meta.description: Shop new & used golf clubs, trade-ins, regripping, and club fitting in Dayton, TN.

hero.headline:
Your game
starts here.
hero.subheadline: New & used clubs, trade-ins, regripping, and fitting — all under one roof in Dayton, TN.

about.heading:
Dayton's home
for golf.
paragraphs: Valley Golf Clubhouse is a locally owned pro shop serving golfers across the Tennessee Valley. We carry drivers, irons, wedges, and putters from top brands — new and pre-owned.
Whether you're upgrading your bag or picking up your first set, we'll help you find the right fit at the right price. Walk-ins welcome; fittings by appointment.

highlights.label: Trade-Ins Welcome
highlights.detail: Bring your old clubs — we'll make you an offer on the spot.

highlights.label: Fitting By Appointment
highlights.detail: Dial in loft, lie, shaft flex, and grip size for your swing.

services.heading: What we offer.
services.intro: Everything you need to play better — no fluff, no upsell.

items.title: New & Used Clubs
items.description: Drivers, irons, wedges, putters, and full sets from major brands. Quality-checked pre-owned options at every price point.

items.title: Trade-Ins
items.description: Swap your old gear for store credit. Fair market valuations, no haggling.

items.title: Regripping
items.description: Worn grips kill your game. We regrip any club while you wait or by next day.

items.title: Club Fitting
items.description: Personalized fitting sessions — loft, lie, shaft flex, grip size, and swing weight tuned to your game.

projects.heading: In stock now.
projects.intro: A sample of what's on the floor. Inventory changes weekly — call or stop by for the latest.

items.title: TaylorMade Qi35 Max Driver
items.description: 460cc head, adjustable loft, low spin for max distance. New in box.

items.title: Callaway Paradym Ai Smoke Irons (5–PW)
items.description: AI-designed face, forgiving cavity back. Lightly used, excellent condition.

items.title: Cleveland CBX4 ZipCore Wedge 56°
items.description: Versatile sand wedge with maximum spin. New.

items.title: Odyssey Ai-ONE Milled Putter
items.description: AI insert for consistent roll. Mallet head, excellent feel. Used — like new.

items.title: Strata 16-Piece Complete Set
items.description: Perfect beginner kit — driver, woods, irons, putter, and bag. New.

items.title: Ping G430 Hybrid 3H
items.description: High launch, easy to hit from any lie. Pre-owned, great shape.

items.quote: Traded in my old irons and walked out with a fitted set for less than I expected. These guys are fair.
items.author: Marcus T.

items.quote: Got my whole bag regripped in under an hour. Night and day difference on the course.
items.author: Donna S.

items.quote: My son's first real set came from Valley Golf. Staff was patient and helped him find the right fit.
items.author: James R.

steps.title: Browse or Call
steps.description: Walk in during business hours or call (423) 555-0199 to ask about inventory.

steps.title: Try & Compare
steps.description: Handle the clubs, ask questions, and compare options side by side.

steps.title: Trade or Buy
steps.description: Bring old clubs for trade-in credit, or buy outright. Fair prices, no pressure.

steps.title: Hit the Course
steps.description: Walk out ready to play. Regrips and adjustments done same day when possible.

items.question: Do you accept trade-ins?
items.answer: Yes. Bring any clubs in decent condition and we'll give you a fair quote on the spot. Trade value is applied as store credit.

items.question: How does club fitting work?
items.answer: Book an appointment and we'll measure your swing speed, launch angle, and preferences to recommend the right shaft, loft, lie, and grip size.

items.question: Do you ship clubs?
items.answer: We're a local shop — all sales are in-store pickup only. No online orders or shipping at this time.

items.question: Is there a warranty on used clubs?
items.answer: Used clubs are sold as-is, but we inspect every club for defects before it hits the floor. If something's off, we'll make it right within 7 days.

items.question: How long does regripping take?
items.answer: Most regrips are done same day. Full-set regrips may take until the next morning depending on volume.
